entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wet flurries over higher terrain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
